sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { Menu, Icon, Input, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react';
import { Link, Router } from '../routes';

class Header extends Component {

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <Segment style={{marginBottom:'0px', fontSize:'20px', borderRadius:'0px', backgroundColor:'#EDC7B7', border:'0px'}} as='h1' textAlign='center'>
          <Icon name='ethereum' />Ethereum-Based Question & Answer System
        </Segment>
        <Menu size='massive' style={{marginTop:'0px', borderRadius:'0px', backgroundColor:'#EEE2DC', border:'0px'}}>
          <Link route="/">
            <Menu.Item
              name="Home"
            />
          </Link>
          <Link route='/userProfile'>
            <Menu.Item
              name="Profile"
            />
          </Link>
          <Link route="/new">
            <Menu.Item
              name="Create New Question"
            />
          </Link>
          <Menu.Menu position="right">
            <Menu.Item>
              <Input icon="search" placeholder="Search..." />
            </Menu.Item>
          </Menu.Menu>
        </Menu>
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

export default Header;
